document.full_text: a california man pleaded not guilty on thursday to kidnapping 11-year-old jaycee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years, clearing the way for trial of the sensational case later this summer.
document.title: california man pleads innocent to dugard kidnapping
lines_and_colors: a california man pleaded not guilty on thursday to kidnapping 11-year-old jaycee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years, clearing the way for trial of the sensational case later this summer.
